main event: A family observed a hovering light that oscillated in different colors while traveling near Louisville, Kentucky on March 19, 1967.
interesting points: The light changed from oscillating colors to a single brilliant white light when approached,The family drove towards the light for six miles before it suddenly disappeared,The son reported seeing something falling from the sky,The hovering object made no sound and had no navigation lights,The family's report was made to the Louisville Police Department after the sighting.
witness description: a family including a father, mother, and their adult children
